name: DunHuang Flying Aspara
description:
The player is trapped in an unknown place. Find a way to leave.

Tutorial: WASD move, space to jump. Press the right button while jumping to fly. Close to the object and press E to interact. Tab key to use the menu.

PS: The game has two levels, currently only Level 1 can be entered. Because the game is not finished yet, the game is over after unlocking level 2

Don't forget to answer the questions after playin：https://forms.gle/afqnKQwTYJ8eEGdY7

Thanks for answer
